CmdLine: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/torch/ezinstall/master/install-deps | bash -e &&     git clone https://github.com/torch/distro.git ~/torch --recursive &&     cd ~/torch &&     ./install.sh &&     ~/torch/install/bin/luarocks install nn &&     ~/torch/install/bin/luarocks install dpnn &&     ~/torch/install/bin/luarocks install image &&     ~/torch/install/bin/luarocks install optim &&     ~/torch/install/bin/luarocks install csvigo
Commands.Name: run
